algorithm.name: L1_MultiLookedDetectedBrowse
algorithm.annotation: This product is the NISAR L1 Multi-Looked Detected Browse (MLD) product. L1 SLC product is the input used for making this MLD product.
Not Applicable ($$this.name$$ does not have an interface)
Not Applicable ($$this.name$$ does not have an interface)
Not Applicable ($$this.name$$ does not have an interface)

science.annotation:
$$item.name.split('/')[-1]$$ $$item.annotation[0].value()$$
Type:\t\t\t$$item._Name().split('_')[0]$$ Group:\t\t\t$$'/'.join (item.name.split('/')[1:-1])$$ Shape:\t\t\t$$item.shape$$ $$enum_table (item) if isinstance (item, pix.binding.enum_type) else None$$ $$flag_table (item) if isinstance (item, pix.binding.flag_type) else None$$

string.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/zero_doppler_start_az_time
string.annotation: Time tag of the first line of the MLD product

string.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/zero_doppler_end_az_time
string.annotation: Time tag of the last line of the MLD product

real.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/az_time_interval
real.annotation: Uniform time interval between consecutive lines of MLD product

real.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/ground_range_start
real.annotation: Ground range in meters to the first pixel of the MLD image

real.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/ground_range_end
real.annotation: Ground range in meters to the last pixel of the MLD image

real.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/ground_range_spacing
real.annotation: Uniform ground range spacing between consecutive pixels of MLD product

real.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/bandwidth
real.annotation: Imaging bandwidth in MHz

real.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/freq_center
real.annotation: Center frequency of MLD in MHz

string.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/swst_offset_sensing_range_first_time/hh
string.annotation: Time of the first image column of the segment, including near and far zero padding effects due to SWST readjustment, multilooking, zero-doppler processing, Set to invalid value in the case of mosaicked DEM

string.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/swst_offset_sensing_range_last_time/hh
string.annotation: Time of the last image column of the segment, including near and far zero padding effects due to SWST readjustment, transients removal, multilooking, zerodoppler processing, Set to invalid value in the case of mosaicked DEM

string.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/swst_offset_sensing_range_first_time/vv
string.annotation: Time of the first image column of the segment, including near and far zero padding effects due to SWST readjustment,multilooking, zero-doppler processing, Set to invalid value in the case of mosaicked DEM

string.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/swst_offset_sensing_range_last_time/vv
string.annotation: Time of the last image column of the segment, including near and far zero padding effects due to SWST readjustment, transients removal, multilooking, zerodoppler processing, Set to invalid value in the case of mosaicked DEM

string.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/swst_offset_sensing_range_first_time/hv
string.annotation: Time of the first image column of the segment, including near and far zero padding effects due to SWST readjustment,multilooking, zero-doppler processing, Set to invalid value in the case of mosaicked DEM

string.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/swst_offset_sensing_range_last_time/hv
string.annotation: Time of the last image column of the segment, including near and far zero padding effects due to SWST readjustment, transients removal, multilooking, zerodoppler processing, Set to invalid value in the case of mosaicked DEM

string.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/swst_offset_sensing_range_first_time/vh
string.annotation: Time of the first image column of the segment, including near and far zero padding effects due to SWST readjustment,multilooking, zero-doppler processing, Set to invalid value in the case of mosaicked DEM

string.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/swst_offset_sensing_range_last_time/vh
string.annotation: Time of the last image column of the segment, including near and far zero padding effects due to SWST readjustment, transients removal, multilooking, zerodoppler processing, Set to invalid value in the case of mosaicked DEM

string.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/swst_offset_sensing_range_first_time/rh
string.annotation: Time of the first image column of the segment, including near and far zero padding effects due to SWST readjustment,multilooking, zero-doppler processing, Set to invalid value in the case of mosaicked DEM

string.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/swst_offset_sensing_range_last_time/rh
string.annotation: Time of the last image column of the segment, including near and far zero padding effects due to SWST readjustment, transients removal, multilooking, zerodoppler processing, Set to invalid value in the case of mosaicked DEM

string.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/swst_offset_sensing_range_first_time/rv
string.annotation: Time of the first image column of the segment, including near and far zero padding effects due to SWST readjustment,multilooking, zero-doppler processing, Set to invalid value in the case of mosaicked DEM

string.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/swst_offset_sensing_range_last_time/rv
string.annotation: Time of the last image column of the segment, including near and far zero padding effects due to SWST readjustment, transients removal, multilooking, zerodoppler processing, Set to invalid value in the case of mosaicked DEM

real.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/hh
real.annotation: Backscatter amplitude for primary mode (HH pol). Focused SLC image. All channels are registered

real.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/hv
real.annotation: Backscatter amplitude for primary mode (HV pol). Focused SLC image. All channels are registered

real.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/vh
real.annotation: Backscatter amplitude for primary mode (VH pol). Focused SLC image. All channels are registered

real.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/vv
real.annotation: Backscatter amplitude for primary mode (VV pol). Focused SLC image. All channels are registered

real.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/rh
real.annotation: Backscatter amplitude for primary mode (RH pol). Focused SLC image. All channels are registered

real.name: /science/backscatter_amplitude/primary_mode/rv
real.annotation: Backscatter amplitude for primary mode (RV pol). Focused SLC image. All channels are registered

string.name: /science/metadata/identification/mission_id
string.annotation: Mission identifier

string.name: /science/metadata/identification/product_type
string.annotation: Product type

string.name: /science/metadata/identification/look_direction
string.annotation: Look direction can be left or right

string.name: /science/metadata/identification/orbit_direction
string.annotation: Orbit direction can be ascending or descending

string.name: /science/metadata/identification/zero_doppler_start_az_time
string.annotation: UTC time corresponding to zero doppler time of the first line of MLD image

string.name: /science/metadata/identification/zero_doppler_end_az_time
string.annotation: UTC time corresponding to zero doppler time of the last line of MLD image

string.name: /science/metadata/identification/planned_datatake_id
string.annotation: List of planned datatakes included in the product

string.name: /science/metadata/identification/planned_obs_id
string.annotation: List of planned observations included in the product

string.name: /science/metadata/identification/nominal_vs_urgent_obs
string.annotation: List of flags indicating if datatakes are nominal or urgent

real.name: /science/metadata/geolocation_grid/latitude
real.annotation: Latitude of the center of the Earth based grid cell. Latitude polynomial grid

real.name: /science/metadata/geolocation_grid/longitude
real.annotation: Longitude of the center of the Earth based grid cell. Longitude polynomial grid

real.name: /science/metadata/geolocation_grid/incidence_angle
real.annotation: Incidence angle grid

real.name: /science/metadata/geolocation_grid/azimuth_angle
real.annotation: Azimuth angle grid

real.name: /science/metadata/geolocation_grid/elevation_angle
real.annotation: Elevation angle grid

real.name: /science/metadata/geolocation_grid/groundrange_to_slantrange
real.annotation: Ground range to ground range grid

string.name: /science/metadata/calibration_info/cal_hh/az_time
string.annotation: Azimuth time tag for calibration information

real.name: /science/metadata/calibration_info/cal_hh/sigma0
real.annotation: 2D LUT to convert DN to sigma 0 assuming constant ellipsoid height as a function of image coordinates,polarimetric calibration information from L0 data (HH pol)

real.name: /science/metadata/calibration_info/cal_hh/beta0
real.annotation: 2D LUT to convert DN to beta 0 assuming constant ellipsoid height as a function of image coordinates, polarimetric calibration information from L0 data (HH pol)

real.name: /science/metadata/calibration_info/cal_hh/gamma0
real.annotation: 2D LUT to convert DN to gamma 0 assuming constant ellipsoid height as a function of image coordinates, polarimetric calibration information from L0 data (HH pol)

string.annotation: Azimuth time tag for noise entry

real.name: /science/metadata/noise_parameters/noise_hh/instrument_noise_hh
real.annotation: 1D/2D lookup tables characterizing instrument noise as a function of image coordinates (HH pol)

string.annotation: Azimuth time tag for noise entry

real.name: /science/metadata/noise_parameters/noise_hv/instrument_noise_hv

real.annotation: 1D/2D lookup tables characterizing instrument noise as a function of image coordinates (VV pol)

string.annotation: Azimuth time tag for noise entry

real.name: /science/metadata/noise_parameters/noise_vh/instrument_noise_vh

string.name: /science/metadata/list_input_filenames/l1_input_granules
string.annotation: List of L1 input SLC files

string.name: /science/metadata/list_input_filenames/orbit_files
string.annotation: List of orbit files

string.name: /science/metadata/list_input_filenames/aux_cal_files
string.annotation: List of calibration files

real.name: /science/metadata/processing_information/chirp_weighting/azimuth_processing
real.annotation: 1-D array in frequency domain for azimuth processing. This is used for processing L0b to L1. FFT length=256 (assumed)

real.name: /science/metadata/processing_information/chirp_weighting/range_processing
real.annotation: 1-D array in frequency domain for range processing. This is used for processing L0b to L1. FFT length=256 (assumed)

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/radar_mode/zero_doppler_start_az_time
string.annotation: start time for mode change

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/radar_mode/zero_doppler_end_az_time
string.annotation: end time for mode change

integer.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/radar_mode/number_modes
integer.annotation: number of modes in this product

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/radar_mode/radar_config_id
string.annotation: List of radar modes

boolean.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/radar_mode/split_spectrum_mode_flag
boolean.annotation: Indicates if the radar mode is a split-spectrum mode or not: True or False

boolean.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/radar_mode/diagnostic_mode_flag
boolean.annotation: Indicates if the radar mode is a diagnostic mode or not: True or False

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/power_gain/zero_doppler_az_time
string.annotation: Azimuth time tag for power gain change

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/caltone/az_time
string.annotation: Azimuth time tag for caltone information

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/ref_replica/zero_doppler_az_time
string.annotation: Zero Doppler azimuth time of the middle of the calibration sequence that the reference replica was created from [UTC]

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/ref_replica/pol
string.annotation: Polarization of the reference replica

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/ref_replica/chirpsource
string.annotation: Source of the reference replica: Nominal or Extracted

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/ref_replica/pgsource
string.annotation: Source of the Product Generation (PG) values used in processing: Model or Extracted

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/ref_replica/ampcoeff
real.annotation: Reference replica amplitude coefficients

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/ref_replica/phasecoeff
real.annotation: Reference replica phase coefficients

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/ref_replica/timedelay
real.annotation: Internal time delay representing the average deviation of the replica location from the location of the transmitted pulse

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/ref_replica/gain
real.annotation: Complex gain to be applied to the range match filter to compensate for the amplitude and phase differences between the two channels in dual polarization data

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/reconstr_replica/zero_doppler_az_time
string.annotation: Zero Doppler azimuth time in azimuth at which replica applies [UTC]

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/reconstr_replica/crosscorrelation_bandwidth
real.annotation: 3-dB pulse width of cross-correlation function between the reconstructed replica and the nominal replica

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/reconstr_replica/crosscorrelation_PSLR
real.annotation: Peak side lobe level (PSLR) of cross-correlation function between the reconstructed replica and the nominal replica

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/reconstr_replica/crosscorrelation_ISLR
real.annotation: Integrated Side Lobe Ratio (ISLR) of cross-correlation function between the reconstructed replica and the nominal replica

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/reconstr_replica/crosscorrelation_peakloc
real.annotation: Peak location of cross-correlation function between the reconstructed replica and the nominal replica

boolean.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/reconstr_replica/validflag
boolean.annotation: Indicates if the cross-correlation between the nominal PG replica and this extracted PG replica resulted in a valid peak location. Set to true if a valid peak location was found; or, false otherwise

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/reconstr_replica/pgproduct_amp
real.annotation: Amplitude of the PG product derived from this replica.

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/reconstr_replica/pgproduct_phase
real.annotation: Phase of the PG product derived from this replica

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/reconstr_replica/modelpgproduct_amp
real.annotation: PG product amplitude value from the input PG product model

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/reconstr_replica/modelpgproduct_phase
real.annotation: PG product phase value from the input PG product model

boolean.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/reconstr_replica/relativepgproduct_validflag
boolean.annotation: Indicates if the amplitude and phase of the PG product passed relative validation.

boolean.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/reconstr_replica/absolutepgproduct_validflag
boolean.annotation: Indicates if the amplitude and phase of the PG product passed the absolute validation.

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_h/reconstr_replica/internal_timedelay
real.annotation: Internal time delay [s] representing the calculated deviation of the location of this PG replica from the location of the transmitted pulse; i.e., the nominal PG replica.

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/ref_replica/zero_doppler_az_time
string.annotation: Zero Doppler azimuth time of the middle of the calibration sequence that the reference replica was created from [UTC]

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/ref_replica/pol
string.annotation: Polarization of the reference replica

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/ref_replica/chirpsource
string.annotation: Source of the reference replica: Nominal or Extracted

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/ref_replica/pgSource
string.annotation: Source of the Product Generation (PG) values used in processing: Model or Extracted

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/ref_replica/ampcoeff
real.annotation: Reference replica amplitude coefficients

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/ref_replica/phasecoeff
real.annotation: Reference replica phase coefficients

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/ref_replica/timedelay
real.annotation: Internal time delay representing the average deviation of the replica location from the location of the transmitted pulse

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/ref_replica/gain
real.annotation: Complex gain to be applied to the range match filter to compensate for the amplitude and phase differences between the two channels in dual polarisation data

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/reconstr_replica/zero_doppler_az_time
string.annotation: Zero Doppler azimuth time in azimuth at which replica applies [UTC]

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/reconstr_replica/crosscorrelation_bandwidth
real.annotation: 3-dB pulse width of cross-correlation function between the reconstructed replica and the nominal replica

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/reconstr_replica/crosscorrelation_PSLR
real.annotation: Peak side lobe level (PSLR) of cross-correlation function between the reconstructed replica and the nominal replica

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/reconstr_replica/crosscorrelation_ISLR
real.annotation: Integrated Side Lobe Ratio (ISLR) of cross-correlation function between the reconstructed replica and the nominal replica

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/reconstr_replica/crosscorrelation_peakloc
real.annotation: Peak location of cross-correlation function between the reconstructed replica and the nominal replica

boolean.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/reconstr_replica/validflag
boolean.annotation: Indicates if the cross-correlation between the nominal PG replica and this extracted PG replica resulted in a valid peak location. Set to true if a valid peak location was found; or, false otherwise

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/reconstr_replica/pgproduct_amp
real.annotation: Amplitude of the PG product derived from this replica.

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/reconstr_replica/pgproduct_phase
real.annotation: Phase of the PG product derived from this replica

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/reconstr_replica/modelpgproduct_amp
real.annotation: PG product amplitude value from the input PG product model

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/reconstr_replica/modelpgproduct_phase
real.annotation: PG product phase value from the input PG product model

boolean.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/reconstr_replica/relativepgproduct_validflag
boolean.annotation: Indicates if the amplitude and phase of the PG product passed relative validation.

boolean.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/reconstr_replica/absolutepgproduct_validflag
boolean.annotation: Indicates if the amplitude and phase of the PG product passed the absolute validation.

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_v/reconstr_replica/internal_timedelay
real.annotation: Internal time delay [s] representing the calculated deviation of the location of this PG replica from the location of the transmitted pulse; i.e., the nominal PG replica.

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/ref_replica/zero_doppler_az_time
string.annotation: Zero Doppler azimuth time of the middle of the calibration sequence that the reference replica was created from [UTC]

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/ref_replica/pol
string.annotation: Polarization of the reference replica

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/ref_replica/chirpsource
string.annotation: Source of the reference replica: Nominal or Extracted

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/ref_replica/pgSource
string.annotation: Source of the Product Generation (PG) values used in processing: Model or Extracted

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/ref_replica/ampcoeff
real.annotation: Reference replica amplitude coefficients

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/ref_replica/phasecoeff
real.annotation: Reference replica phase coefficients

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/ref_replica/timedelay
real.annotation: Internal time delay representing the average deviation of the replica location from the location of the transmitted pulse

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/ref_replica/gain
real.annotation: Complex gain to be applied to the range match filter to compensate for the amplitude and phase differences between the two channels in dual polarisation data

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/reconstr_replica/zero_doppler_az_time
string.annotation: Zero Doppler azimuth time in azimuth at which replica applies [UTC]

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/reconstr_replica/crosscorrelation_bandwidth
real.annotation: 3-dB pulse width of cross-correlation function between the reconstructed replica and the nominal replica

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/reconstr_replica/crosscorrelation_PSLR
real.annotation: Peak side lobe level (PSLR) of cross-correlation function between the reconstructed replica and the nominal replica

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/reconstr_replica/crosscorrelation_ISLR
real.annotation: Integrated Side Lobe Ratio (ISLR) of cross-correlation function between the reconstructed replica and the nominal replica

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/reconstr_replica/crosscorrelation_peakloc
real.annotation: Peak location of cross-correlation function between the reconstructed replica and the nominal replica

boolean.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/reconstr_replica/validflag
boolean.annotation: Indicates if the cross-correlation between the nominal PG replica and this extracted PG replica resulted in a valid peak location. Set to true if a valid peak location was found; or, false otherwise

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/reconstr_replica/pgproduct_amp
real.annotation: Amplitude of the PG product derived from this replica.

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/reconstr_replica/pgproduct_phase
real.annotation: Phase of the PG product derived from this replica

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/reconstr_replica/modelpgproduct_amp
real.annotation: PG product amplitude value from the input PG product model

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/reconstr_replica/modelpgproduct_phase
real.annotation: PG product phase value from the input PG product model

boolean.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/reconstr_replica/relativepgproduct_validflag
boolean.annotation: Indicates if the amplitude and phase of the PG product passed relative validation.

boolean.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/reconstr_replica/absolutepgproduct_validflag
boolean.annotation: Indicates if the amplitude and phase of the PG product passed the absolute validation.

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/chirp_r/reconstr_replica/internal_timedelay
real.annotation: Internal time delay [s] representing the calculated deviation of the location of this PG replica from the location of the transmitted pulse; i.e., the nominal PG replica.

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/doppler_centroid/zero_doppler_az_time
string.annotation: Azimuth time tags for doppler centroid entries

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/doppler_centroid/t0
real.annotation: ground_range_time (Two-way ground range time origin)

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/doppler_centroid/geometry_dcpolynomial
real.annotation: Doppler centroid as function of ground range time, estimated from orbit, expressed as the following polynomial (assuming 4 coefficients) Doppler centroid = d0 + d1(tSR-t0) + d2(tSR-t0)^2 + d3(tSR-t0)^3, where tSR = 2-way ground range time

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/doppler_centroid/data_dcpolynomial
real.annotation: Doppler centroid as function of ground range time, estimated from data, expressed as the following polynomial (assuming 4 coefficients) Doppler centroid = d0 + d1(tSR-t0) + d2(tSR-t0)^2 + d3(tSR-t0)^3, where tSR = 2-way ground range time

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/doppler_centroid/datadc_rmserror
real.annotation: The RMS error of the Doppler centroid estimate. It is calculated as the average of the individual RMS residual errors between input fine Doppler centroid estimates and the fitted polynomial. If the Doppler centroid was not estimated from data, this is set to 0

boolean.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/doppler_centroid/datadc_rmserror_abovethreshold
boolean.annotation: False if the RMS error is below the acceptable threshold for the Doppler centroid estimated from the data. True if the RMS error is greater than or equal to the acceptable threshold

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/az_fm_rate/zero_doppler_az_time
string.annotation: Azimuth time tag for Azimuth FM rate entry

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/az_fm_rate/t0
real.annotation: Two-way ground range time origin used for azimuth FM rate calculations

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/az_fm_rate/az_fm_rate_polynomial
real.annotation: azimuth FM rate coefficients array in order of c0 [Hz/s] c1 [Hz/s^2] c2 [Hz/s^3] c3 [Hz/s^4]

string.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/terrain_height/zero_doppler_az_time
string.annotation: Azimuth time tag for terrain height entry

real.name: /science/metadata/instrument_data/terrain_height/height_value
real.annotation: Terrain height record containing the average terrain height (in meters above the ocean surface) for the given zero Doppler azimuth time

flag.name: /science/image_quality_flags/backscatter_data_quality_hh
flag.annotation: Bit flags that represent the quality of the backscatter within each grid cell

flag.name: /science/image_quality_flags/backscatter_data_quality_vv
flag.annotation: Bit flags that represent the quality of the backscatter within each grid cell

flag.name: /science/image_quality_flags/backscatter_data_quality_hv
flag.annotation: Bit flags that represent the quality of the backscatter within each grid cell

flag.name: /science/image_quality_flags/backscatter_data_quality_vh
flag.annotation: Bit flags that represent the quality of the backscatter within each grid cell

flag.name: /science/image_quality_flags/backscatter_data_quality_rh
flag.annotation: Bit flags that represent the quality of the backscatter within each grid cell

flag.name: /science/image_quality_flags/backscatter_data_quality_rv
flag.annotation: Bit flags that represent the quality of the backscatter within each grid cell

flag.name: /science/image_quality_flags/surface_conditions
flag.annotation: Bit flags that represent the surface conditions within each grid cell

bit.name: water_body_detection
bit.off: No or insignificant presence of open water (according to static land/water database) within a grid cell
bit.on: Significant presence of open water (according to static land/water database) within a grid cell

bit.name: shadow_detection
bit.off: No or insignificant presence of shadow within a grid cell
bit.on: Significant presence of shadow within a grid cell

bit.name: layover_detection
bit.off: No or insignificant presence of layover within a grid cell
bit.on: Significant presence of layover within a grid cell

bit.name: shadow_layover_detection
bit.off: No or insignificant presence of both shadow and layover within a grid cell
bit.on: Significant presence of both shadow and layover within a grid cell

flag.name: /science/image_quality_flags/corrections
flag.annotation: Bit flags that represent corrections applied to this product

bit.name: topographic_or_terrain_correction
bit.off: Topographic/terrain correction has not been applied

bit.name: tropospheric_correction
bit.off: Tropospheric correction has not been applied

bit.name: ionospheric_correction
bit.off: Ionospheric correction has not been applied

string.name: /science/metadata/orbit/NOE/timestamp
string.annotation: Timestamp at which NOE orbit state vectors apply [UTC]

string.name: /science/metadata/orbit/NOE/frame
string.annotation: Reference frame of the NOE orbit state data

string.name: /science/metadata/orbit/NOE/orbit_type
string.annotation: Orbit type options: NOE, MOE, POE

real.name: /science/metadata/orbit/NOE/position
real.annotation: NOE position vector record. This record contains the platform position data with respect to the specified reference frame

real.name: /science/metadata/orbit/NOE/velocity
real.annotation: NOE velocity vector record. This record contains the platform velocity data with respect to the specified reference frame

real.name: /science/metadata/orbit/NOE/acceleration
real.annotation: NOE acceleration vector record. This record contains the platform acceleration data with respect to the specified reference frame

string.name: /science/metadata/orbit/MOE/timestamp
string.annotation: Timestamp at which MOE orbit state vectors apply [UTC]

string.name: /science/metadata/orbit/MOE/frame
string.annotation: Reference frame of the MOE orbit state data

string.name: /science/metadata/orbit/MOE/orbit_type
string.annotation: Orbit type options: NOE, MOE, POE

real.name: /science/metadata/orbit/MOE/position
real.annotation: MOE position vector record. This record contains the platform position data with respect to the specified reference frame

real.name: /science/metadata/orbit/MOE/velocity
real.annotation: MOE velocity vector record. This record contains the platform velocity data with respect to the specified reference frame

real.name: /science/metadata/orbit/MOE/acceleration
real.annotation: MOE acceleration vector record. This record contains the platform acceleration data with respect to the specified reference frame

string.name: /science/metadata/orbit/POE/timestamp
string.annotation: Timestamp at which POE orbit state vectors apply [UTC]

string.name: /science/metadata/orbit/POE/frame
string.annotation: Reference frame of the POE orbit state data

string.name: /science/metadata/orbit/POE/orbit_type
string.annotation: Orbit type options: NOE, MOE, POE

real.name: /science/metadata/orbit/POE/position
real.annotation: POE position vector record. This record contains the platform position data with respect to the specified reference frame

real.name: /science/metadata/orbit/POE/velocity
real.annotation: POE velocity vector record. This record contains the platform velocity data with respect to the specified reference frame

real.name: /science/metadata/orbit/POE/acceleration
real.annotation: POE acceleration vector record. This record contains the platform acceleration data with respect to the specified reference frame

string.name: /science/metadata/attitude/predict/timestamp
string.annotation: Timestamp to which predicted attitude data applies [UTC]

string.name: /science/metadata/attitude/predict/frame
string.annotation: Reference frame of the predicted attitude data

string.name: /science/metadata/attitude/predict/attitude_type
string.annotation: Attitude type options: Predicted, Reconstructed

real.name: /science/metadata/attitude/predict/quaternions
real.annotation: Predicted attitude quaternions (q0, q1, q2, q3)

real.name: /science/metadata/attitude/predict/angular_velocity
real.annotation: Components of predicted attitude angular velocity vectors (wx, wy, wz)

real.name: /science/metadata/attitude/predict/euler_angles
real.annotation: Predicted attitude euler angles (roll, pitch, yaw)

string.name: /science/metadata/attitude/reconstr/timestamp
string.annotation: Timestamp to which reconstructed attitude data applies [UTC]

string.name: /science/metadata/attitude/reconstr/frame
string.annotation: Reference frame of the reconstructed attitude data

string.name: /science/metadata/attitude/reconstr/attitude_type
string.annotation: Attitude type options: Predicted, Reconstructed

real.name: /science/metadata/attitude/reconstr/quaternions
real.annotation: Reconstructed attitude quaternions (q0, q1, q2, q3)

real.name: /science/metadata/attitude/reconstr/angular_velocity
real.annotation: Components of reconstructed attitude angular velocity vectors (wx, wy, wz)

real.name: /science/metadata/attitude/reconstr/euler_angles
real.annotation: Reconstructed attitude euler angles (roll, pitch, yaw)
